name: Twin Stick Blower
description:
Twin Stick Blower

A game made for the Winter Game Jam on the AAU Klagenfurt. The theme was "Unconventional Travel" (+ Raccoon) and the game was made over the course of 48 hours.

Take your controller to power up your leaf blowers. Use the leaf blowers to move and clean of your area of leaves.

You can do that in single player mode fighting against the time.

Or you could play with up to 4 friends to find out who is the best leaf-blower in town.

Important Message

If possible please use the Windows version. Download and use DS4Windows if you want to play with PS4 controllers. Xbox controller should work straight away.

The WebGL version is not working with Xbox Controllers, but with PS4 controllers (without DS4Windows).

Don't ask us why.

How to Play
  • Use the mouse to navigate through the menu
  • Controller recommended to play (necessary for multiplayer)
  • Controller: Each analogue stick controls one leaf blower
  • Keyboard: WASD controls one leaf blower, the arrow keys the other one
  • Use the push-back of the leaf blowers to move and blow leaves
Credits
